Package main.armor

Class Shield

java.lang.Object
main.items.Item
main.armor.ArmorBase
main.armor.Shield
All Implemented Interfaces:
Breakable, Defensive, Equippable, Repairable, Upgradeable, Offhand
public class Shield extends ArmorBase implements Breakable, Repairable, Equippable, Upgradeable, Offhand, Defensive
A class for modeling Shield and offhand objects to be used by the player
